data.name: ComplexType_InstancesCannotBeShared
data.value: ComplexObject instances cannot be shared.

data.name: CyclicReferenceError
data.value: Reference cycle detected. Entity or ComplexObject members cannot contain cyclic references.

data.name: DomainClientFactory_FaildToGetGenericDomainClient
data.value: Faild to construct generic WebDomainClient

data.name: DomainClientFactory_MissingClientWebReference
data.value: You must reference the assembly 'OpenRiaServices.DomainServices.Client.Web'

data.name: DomainClientFactory_ServiceContractMustBeAnInterface
data.value: Service contract must be an interface

data.name: DomainClient_CancellationNotSupported
data.value: The DomainClient '{0}' does not support cancellation.

data.name: DomainClient_EmptyChangeSet
data.value: The submitted change-set was empty.

data.name: DomainClient_EntityTypesAlreadyInitialized
data.value: EntityTypes has already been initialized

data.name: DomainClient_InvocationNameCannotBeNullOrEmpty
data.value: Custom method invocation name cannot be null or empty.

data.name: DomainContext_EntityContainerCannotBeNull
data.value: The EntityContainer for a DomainContext cannot be null.

data.name: DomainContext_InvalidEntityQueryDomainClient
data.value: The specified EntityQuery '{0}' cannot be loaded because it was not created by this DomainContext.

data.name: DomainContext_InvalidServiceUri
data.value: The specified service URI is not correctly formatted.

data.name: DomainContext_InvokeOperationFailed
data.value: Invoke operation '{0}' failed. {1}

data.name: DomainContext_InvokeOperationFailed_Validation
data.value: Invoke operation '{0}' failed validation. Please inspect ValidationErrors on the operation for details.

data.name: DomainContext_LoadOperationFailed
data.value: Load operation failed for query '{0}'. {1}

data.name: DomainContext_LoadOperationFailed_Validation
data.value: Load operation for query '{0}' failed validation. Please inspect ValidationErrors on the operation for details.

data.name: DomainContext_NamedUpdateMethodDoesNotExist
data.value: The custom update method '{0}' called on entity '{1}' was called through the '{2}' DomainContext, which is not the correct DomainContext. The method may be available through another DomainContext.

data.name: DomainContext_SubmitAlreadyInProgress
data.value: A SubmitChanges operation is already in progress on this DomainContext.

data.name: DomainContext_SubmitOperationFailed
data.value: Submit operation failed. {0}

data.name: DomainContext_SubmitOperationFailed_Conflicts
data.value: Submit operation failed due to conflicts. Please inspect Entity.EntityConflict for each entity in EntitiesInError for more information.

data.name: DomainContext_SubmitOperationFailed_Validation
data.value: Submit operation failed validation. Please inspect Entity.ValidationErrors for each entity in EntitiesInError for more information.

data.name: EntityCollection_ModificationNotAllowedForExternalReference
data.value: Modification of an EntityCollection whose source is external is not permitted.

data.name: EntityConflict_CannotResolveDeleteConflict
data.value: Resolve cannot be called for delete conflicts.

data.name: EntityConflict_IsDeleteConflict
data.value: PropertyNames are not available for delete conflicts.

data.name: EntityContainerDoesntContainEntityType
data.value: This EntityContainer does not contain an EntitySet of type '{0}'. If the type is external to this EntityContainer, please make sure you’ve called AddReference to establish the external link.

data.name: EntityContainer_CannotRetrieveEntitySetForDerivedEntity
data.value: Cannot retrieve an EntitySet for the derived entity type '{0}'. Use EntityContainer.GetEntitySet(Type) to get the EntitySet for the base entity type '{1}'.

data.name: EntityContainer_CrossContainerAttach
data.value: Entity '{0}' cannot be attached to this EntityContainer because it is already attached to another EntityContainer.

data.name: EntityContainer_EntitySetAlreadyExists
data.value: The EntitySet for Entity '{0}' already exists in the EntityContainer.

data.name: EntityKey_CannotBeNull
data.value: An EntityKey value cannot be null

data.name: EntityKey_EmptyKeyMembers
data.value: To create an EntityKey, you must specify at least one key value.

data.name: EntityKey_NullIdentity
data.value: Entity '{0}' cannot be added to cache because it doesn't have a valid identity.

data.name: EntityQuery_NotComposable
data.value: EntityQuery for Type '{0}' targeting query operation '{1}' does not support query composition.

data.name: EntitySet_DuplicateIdentity
data.value: An entity with the same identity already exists in this EntitySet.

data.name: EntitySet_EntityAlreadyAttached
data.value: The entity being added is already attached.

data.name: EntitySet_EntityAlreadyInSet
data.value: The specified entity is already contained in an EntitySet

data.name: EntitySet_EntityNotInSet
data.value: The specified entity is not contained in this EntitySet.

data.name: EntitySet_UnsupportedOperation
data.value: This EntitySet of Type '{0}' does not support the '{1}' operation.

data.name: EntitySet_Wrong_Type
data.value: EntitySet of Type '{0}' cannot contain instances of Type '{1}'.

data.name: Entity_CantReparentComposedChild
data.value: Composed child entity '{0}' cannot be assigned to a new parent.

data.name: Entity_ChildCannotBeItsParent
data.value: A compositional association on an entity cannot contain the entity itself.

data.name: Entity_InvokeOnDeletedEntity
data.value: A custom method cannot be invoked on an entity in a Deleted EntityState.

data.name: Entity_InvokeOnDetachedEntity
data.value: A custom method cannot be invoked on a Detached entity.

data.name: Entity_InvokeWhileSubmitting
data.value: A custom method cannot be invoked on an entity that is part of a change-set that is in the process of being submitted.

data.name: Entity_KeyMembersCannotBeChanged
data.value: The value of key member '{0}' on an instance of an entity of type '{1}' has changed. Entity key members cannot be changed.

data.name: Entity_MultipleCustomMethodInvocations
data.value: Only one pending custom method invocation is allowed per entity.

data.name: Entity_NoEntityActionWithName
data.value: Can not find any entity action named '{0}'

data.name: Entity_Not_In_Collection
data.value: The specified entity is not a member of this collection

data.name: Entity_Property_NotChangeTracked
data.value: The property '{0}' on entity type '{1}' is not a change tracked data member.

data.name: Entity_ReadOnly
data.value: This entity is currently read-only. One of the following conditions exist: a custom method has been invoked, a submit operation is in progress, or edit operations are not supported for the entity type.

data.name: Entity_UncommittedChanges
data.value: Entity '{0}' is currently being edited and has uncommitted changes. A call to BeginEdit must be followed by a call to EndEdit or CancelEdit before changes can be submitted.

data.name: Entity_UndoInvokeOnlyForInvokedActions
data.value: Can only undo currently invoked actions

data.name: Entity_UndoInvokeWhileSubmitting
data.value: A custom method cannot be undone on an entity that is part of a change-set that is in the process of being submitted.

data.name: IsNotSupported
data.value: '{0}' is not supported.

data.name: LoadResult_OperationNotSucessfullyCompleted
data.value: The operation must have been sucessfully completed

data.value: '{0}' must be an Entity.

data.value: MarkErrorAsHandled can only be called if HasError is true.

data.name: Parameter_NullOrEmpty
data.value: The parameter '{0}' cannot be null or empty.

data.value: Type '{0}' does not derive from Entity
